snippet: Open-outcry traders sprang into action during an electronic trading halt in CME Group Inc agricultural markets on Tuesday, but a better solution to the outage would have been to close the pits down too, traders and investors said a day later....

headline.print_headline: CME Group Trading Outage Exposes Weakened Trading Floor
headline.main: CME Group Trading Outage Exposes Weakened Trading Floor

lead_paragraph: Open-outcry traders sprang into action during an electronic trading halt in CME Group Inc agricultural markets on Tuesday, but a better solution to the outage would have been to close the pits down too, traders and investors said a day later.
